| # | Actionable Idea |
| --- | --- |
| 1 | Identity graphs provide a comprehensive understanding of customers |
| 2 | Identity graphs can be used to personalize marketing campaigns |
| 3 | Identity graphs can be built using various data sources |
| 4 | High-quality data is crucial for building reliable identity graphs |
| 5 | Machine learning can be used to build and maintain identity graphs |
| 6 | Data security and privacy must be considered when using identity graphs |
| 7 | Identity graphs can be used for fraud detection, risk management, and personalization |
| 8 | Graph databases are suitable for storing and querying identity graphs |
| 9 | Apache Spark is a powerful platform for building identity graphs |
| 10 | Identity graphs can provide a competitive advantage by improving customer engagement and loyalty |
